verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5375>Take<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%>

From <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6635>host,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

<S%H2063>This<s%> shall be the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> about the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> things:

And when the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H5265>sets<s%> <S%H5265>forward,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and they shall <S%H3381>take<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H4539>covering<s%> <S%H6532>veil,<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H5715>testimony<s%> with it:

And shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> the <S%H3681>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H4605>over<s%> it a <S%H899>cloth<s%> <S%H3632>wholly<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and shall <S%H7760>put<s%> in the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof.

And on the <S%H7979>table<s%> of show <S%H6440>bread<s%> they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> the <S%H7086>dishes,<s%> and the <S%H3709>spoons,<s%> and the <S%H4518>bowls,<s%> and <S%H7184>covers<s%> to <S%H5258>cover<s%> with: and the <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> shall be <S%H5921>thereon:<s%>

And they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> on them a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H853>same<s%> with a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and shall <S%H7760>put<s%> in the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof.

And they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> of the <S%H3974>light,<s%> and his <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> and his <S%H4457>tongs,<s%> and his <S%H4289>firepans,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof, with <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H8334>minister<s%> to it:

And they shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof <S%H413>within<s%> a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it on a <S%H4132>bar.<s%>

And on the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> it with a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and shall <S%H7725>put<s%> to the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof:

And they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H8335>ministry,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in a <S%H899>cloth<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> them with a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> them <S%H5921>on<s%> a <S%H4132>bar:<s%>
And they shall take away the <S%H1878>ashes<s%> from the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H713>purple<s%> <S%H899>cloth<s%> <S%H5921>thereon:<s%>

And they shall <S%H5414>put<s%> on it <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof, with <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> it, even the <S%H4289>censers,<s%> the meat <S%H4207>hooks,<s%> and the <S%H3257>shovels,<s%> and the <S%H4219>basins,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and they shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> on it a <S%H3681>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> to the <S%H905>staves<s%> of it.

And when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> have made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H3680>covering<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> as the <S%H4264>camp<s%> is to <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>forward;<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> it: but they shall not <S%H5060>touch<s%> any <S%H6944>holy<s%> thing, lest they <S%H4191>die.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> things are the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And to the <S%H6486>office<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> pertains the <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> and the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%> and the <S%H8548>daily<s%> meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H6486>oversight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> that therein is, in the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and in the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to Aaron <S%H175><s%><S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H3772>Cut<s%> you not off the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%>

But thus <S%H6213>do<s%> to them, that they may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and not <S%H4191>die,<s%> when they <S%H5066>approach<s%> to the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> things: <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> in, and <S%H7760>appoint<s%> them <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H5656>service<s%> and to his <S%H4853>burden:<s%>
But they shall not <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H7200>see<s%> when the <S%H6944>holy<s%> things are <S%H1104>covered,<s%> lest they <S%H4191>die.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5375>Take<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershon,<s%> throughout the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families;<s%>

From <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shall you <S%H6485>number<s%> them; <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H935>enter<s%> in to <S%H6633>perform<s%> the <S%H5656>service,<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>
<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites,<s%> to <S%H5647>serve,<s%> and for <S%H4853>burdens:<s%>

And they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> his <S%H4372>covering,<s%> and the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of the <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> skins that is <S%H4605>above<s%> on it, and the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%>

And the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> and the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is by the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and by the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and their <S%H4340>cords,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of their <S%H5656>service,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H6213>made<s%> for them: so shall they <S%H5647>serve.<s%>

At the <S%H6310>appointment<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall be <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4853>burdens,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5656>service:<s%> and you shall <S%H6485>appoint<s%> to them in <S%H4931>charge<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4853>burdens.<s%>

<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershon<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%> and their <S%H4931>charge<s%> shall be under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>
As for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> you shall <S%H6485>number<s%> them after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers;<s%>

From <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even to <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shall you <S%H6485>number<s%> them, <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H935>enters<s%> into the <S%H6635>service,<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>work<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of their <S%H4853>burden,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation;<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof, and the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> thereof, and <S%H134>sockets<s%> thereof,

And the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and their <S%H134>sockets,<s%> and their <S%H3489>pins,<s%> and their <S%H4340>cords,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3627>instruments,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5656>service:<s%> and by <S%H8034>name<s%> you shall <S%H6485>reckon<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of their <S%H4853>burden.<s%>

<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5656>service,<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> and after the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%>

From <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even to <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H935>enters<s%> into the <S%H6635>service,<s%> for the <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%>
And those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them by their <S%H4940>families<s%> were two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> were they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that might <S%H5647>do<s%> <S%H5647>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> did <S%H6485>number<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershon,<s%> throughout their <S%H4940>families,<s%> and by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%>

From <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even to <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H935>enters<s%> into the <S%H6635>service,<s%> for the <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%>

Even those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, throughout their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> were two <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Gershon, of <S%H3605>all<s%> that might <S%H5647>do<s%> <S%H5647>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> did <S%H6485>number<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> throughout their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%>

From <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even to <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H935>enters<s%> into the <S%H6635>service,<s%> for the <S%H5656>work<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%>
Even those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> be those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> and after the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%>

From <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> even to <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H5656>ministry,<s%> and the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4853>burden<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>
Even those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>fourscore,<s%>
